name: Prevent FuzzyPanda Malware
description: This playbook will block traffic to the FuzzyPanda data exfil site

workflow.name: Receive IOC
workflow.description: Get FuzzyPanda Data Exfil Site IP Address of 1.2.3.4

commands.command: Open SIEM solution and add rule to look for 1.2.3.4
